title: Project One
description: A web application built with React and TypeScript that helps users manage their daily tasks and schedule. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, priority labeling, and integration with calendar applications.

title: Project Two
description: A mobile app developed with React Native that allows users to track their fitness activities, set goals, and monitor progress. Includes features like step counting, workout tracking, and nutrition logging.

title: Project Three
description: A personal blog built with Astro and MDX, featuring a clean design and fast performance. Includes features like category filtering, search functionality, and responsive layout for all devices.
